item.title: Tiny [Pali76 508] Issue!
item.dc:creator: @R3D_Barrage R3D Barrage
item.description:
@R3D_Barrage wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals("unknownzone") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("unknown pker")) { p.teleportTo(1971 + Misc.random(1), 5001 + Misc.random(1), 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1578, 0, 1577,0); }

That is my secret zone command right now is it set to just my name like; if (cmd[0].equals(“unknownzone”) && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“unknown pker”)) { I want it to be so my other friend admin cudi can do it too. So would it be like if (cmd[0].equals(“unknownzone”) && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“unknown pker”)) || p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin cudi”)) { or what??

Read full topic
